sentences.sContent: Actually, it only takes one drink to get me loaded. Trouble is, I can't remember if it's the thirteenth or fourteenth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Actually, it only takes one drink to get me loaded. Trouble is, I can't remember if it's the thirteenth or fourteenth.
sentences.sCn: 事实上，只有一杯酒就让我醉倒了，糟糕的是，我不能想起来它是第十三杯还是第十四杯。

words.tran: 第四的，第四个的；四分之一的
第四，月的第四日；四分之一
